headline: How Investors May Respond To Northern Trust (NTRS) Prime Rate Cut And Evolving Lending Strategy
summary: Northern Trust recently decreased its prime rate from 7.00% to 6.75%, effective 11 December 2025, lowering borrowing benchmarks for its most creditworthy clients and updating loan pricing across its banking franchise. This move, alongside new leadership in wealth management investing and recent institutional mandate wins, highlights how Northern Trust is adjusting its lending and advisory model to stay competitive with sophisticated clients. We’ll now examine how this prime rate reduction...
